articles.title: Curiosity rover finds cute little rock 'lizard' on Mars - Livescience.com
articles.description: A small rock arch in Gale Crater is a whimsical example of the textures of Mars.
articles.content:
Curiosity rover snapped this image of a cute textured rock within Gale Crater on sol 3190 (or for Earthlings, July 27, 2021).  (Image credit: NASA/JPL-Caltech/LANL)
